de.japi.components.listeners

Class AbstractJapi2Listener

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.japi.components.listeners.AbstractJapi2Listener
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Japi2ActionListener, Japi2AdjustmentListener, Japi2ComponentListener, Japi2FocusListener, Japi2ItemListener, Japi2KeyListener, Japi2MouseListener, Japi2MouseMotionListener, Japi2TextListener, Japi2WindowListener

    public class AbstractJapi2Listener
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract listener class which contains common attributes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int id
      The id of the component to which this listener is listening to.
      protected Japi2Session session
      The session object, used to send action triggers to the client and perform logging.
      protected int type
      The type argument.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractJapi2Listener(Japi2Session session, int id)
      Constructs a new listener object.
      AbstractJapi2Listener(Japi2Session session, int id, int type)
      Constructs a new listener object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected boolean isType(int type)
      Tests if the given type id type matches with the initial set type id in the constructor.
      void setId(int id)
      Sets the object id of the object on which this listener listens.
      protected void trigger()
      Triggers the JAPI2 listener and sends the id of the triggering object to the client.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • session

        protected Japi2Session session
        The session object, used to send action triggers to the client and perform logging.

      • id

        The id of the component to which this listener is listening to.

      • type

        protected int type
        The type argument. See isType(int).

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractJapi2Listener

        public AbstractJapi2Listener(Japi2Session session,
                             int id,
                             int type)
        Constructs a new listener object.
        Parameters:
        session - the session object.
        id - the id of the object which is related to this listener.
        type - an optional type argument which can be used together with isType(int).

      • AbstractJapi2Listener

        public AbstractJapi2Listener(Japi2Session session,
                             int id)
        Constructs a new listener object.
        Parameters:
        session - the session object.
        id - the id of the object which is related to this listener.

    • Method Detail

      • setId

        public void setId(int id)
        Sets the object id of the object on which this listener listens.
        Parameters:
        id - of the object.

      • trigger

        protected void trigger()
        Triggers the JAPI2 listener and sends the id of the triggering object to the client. Exception handling and debug output is automagically performed.

      • isType

        protected boolean isType(int type)
        Tests if the given type id type matches with the initial set type id in the constructor.
        Parameters:
        type - the type id to check.
        Returns:
        true if no type id was set using the special constructor or the type is matching. Otherwise false is returned.
